# Diversity measures based on Entropy

**divent** is an R package that provides functions to estimate alpha,
beta and gamma diversity of communities, including phylogenetic and
functional diversity.

It is a reboot of the package **entropart** to make it tidy, easier to
use and optimize the code that has been added along years of research.

## Installation

You can install the development version of divent from
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("EricMarcon/divent")
```

## Details

In the divent package, individuals of different *species* are counted in
several *communities* which may (or not) be aggregated to define a
*metacommunity*. In the metacommunity, the probability to find a species
in the weighted average of probabilities in communities. This is a
naming convention, which may correspond to plots in a forest inventory
or any data organized the same way.

``` r
# Abundances of three communities with four species
abd <- matrix(
  c(
    10,  0, 25, 10, 
    20, 15, 10, 35, 
     0, 10,  5,  2
  ),
  ncol = 4
)
# Community weights
w <- c(1, 2, 1)

# Organize the data
library("divent")
abd |>
  as_abundances(weights = w) |>
  # Plot it
  plot(type = "Metacommunity")
```

![](reference/figures/README-MetaCommunitydf-1.png)

Basic functions allow computing diversity of a community. Example data
is a 6.25ha plot of rainforest in Paracou, French Guiana, divided into 4
subplots.

``` r
paracou_6_abd |>
  autoplot()
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-2-1.png)

Entropies such as Shannon’s, Simpson’s, or Hurlbert’s, and explicit
diversity (i.e. effective number of species), aka Hill numbers, are
estimated.

``` r
# Diversity of a tropical rainforest
div_richness(paracou_6_abd)
#> # A tibble: 4 × 5
#>   site      weight estimator   order diversity
#>   <chr>      <dbl> <chr>       <dbl>     <dbl>
#> 1 subplot_1   1.56 Jackknife 3     0       355
#> 2 subplot_2   1.56 Jackknife 2     0       348
#> 3 subplot_3   1.56 Jackknife 2     0       315
#> 4 subplot_4   1.56 Jackknife 2     0       296
ent_shannon(paracou_6_abd)
#> # A tibble: 4 × 5
#>   site      weight estimator order entropy
#>   <chr>      <dbl> <chr>     <dbl>   <dbl>
#> 1 subplot_1   1.56 UnveilJ       1    4.57
#> 2 subplot_2   1.56 UnveilJ       1    4.73
#> 3 subplot_3   1.56 UnveilJ       1    4.65
#> 4 subplot_4   1.56 UnveilJ       1    4.55
ent_simpson(paracou_6_abd)
#> # A tibble: 4 × 5
#>   site      weight estimator order entropy
#>   <chr>      <dbl> <chr>     <dbl>   <dbl>
#> 1 subplot_1   1.56 Lande         2   0.976
#> 2 subplot_2   1.56 Lande         2   0.978
#> 3 subplot_3   1.56 Lande         2   0.980
#> 4 subplot_4   1.56 Lande         2   0.972
```

By default, the best available estimator of diversity is used, according
to the data. Diversity profiles are estimated.

``` r
profile_hill(paracou_6_abd) %>% autoplot
```

![](reference/figures/README-div_profile-1.png)

Communities can be simulated and plotted.

``` r
rc <- rcommunity(1, size = 10000, distribution = "lnorm")
autoplot(rc, fit_rac = TRUE, distribution = "lnorm")
```

![](reference/figures/README-rcommunity-1.png)

Phylogenetic entropy and diversity can be calculated if a phylogenetic
(or functional), ultrametric tree is provided, with the state-of-the-art
estimation-bias correction.

``` r
# Phylogenetic diversity of order 1, based on the taxonomy
div_phylo(paracou_6_abd, tree = paracou_6_taxo, q = 1)
#> # A tibble: 4 × 4
#>   site      weight estimator diversity
#>   <chr>      <dbl> <chr>         <dbl>
#> 1 subplot_1   1.56 UnveilJ        41.0
#> 2 subplot_2   1.56 UnveilJ        52.9
#> 3 subplot_3   1.56 UnveilJ        46.1
#> 4 subplot_4   1.56 UnveilJ        43.2
```

Similarity-based diversity is calculated, based on a similarity matrix.

``` r
# Similarity is computed from the functional distance matrix of Paracou species
Z <- fun_similarity(paracou_6_fundist)
# Calculate diversity of order 2
div_similarity(paracou_6_abd, similarities = Z, q = 2)
#> # A tibble: 4 × 5
#>   site      weight estimator order diversity
#>   <chr>      <dbl> <chr>     <dbl>     <dbl>
#> 1 subplot_1   1.56 UnveilJ       2      1.31
#> 2 subplot_2   1.56 UnveilJ       2      1.33
#> 3 subplot_3   1.56 UnveilJ       2      1.32
#> 4 subplot_4   1.56 UnveilJ       2      1.30
```

The diversity of a metacommunity, i.e. \\\gamma\\ diversity, can be
partitioned into \\\alpha\\ (that of communities) and \\\beta\\
diversities.

``` r
# Partitioning of diversity of order 1 (Shannon)
div_part(paracou_6_abd, q = 1)
#> # A tibble: 7 × 6
#>   site          scale     estimator order diversity weight
#>   <chr>         <chr>     <chr>     <dbl>     <dbl>  <dbl>
#> 1 Metacommunity gamma     "UnveilJ"     1    111.     6.25
#> 2 Metacommunity beta      ""            1      1.09  NA   
#> 3 Metacommunity alpha     ""            1    102.    NA   
#> 4 subplot_1     community "UnveilJ"     1     96.3    1.56
#> 5 subplot_2     community "UnveilJ"     1    113.     1.56
#> 6 subplot_3     community "UnveilJ"     1    105.     1.56
#> 7 subplot_4     community "UnveilJ"     1     94.6    1.56
```

## Vignettes

A quick
[introduction](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/articles/divent.html)
is in
[`vignette("divent")`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/articles/divent.md).

A full documentation is available online, in the “Articles” section of
the web site of the vignette.

The [documentation of the development
version](https://EricMarcon.github.io/divent/dev/) is also available.

## Reference

Marcon, E. and Herault, B. (2015). entropart: An R Package to Measure
and Partition Diversity. *Journal of Statistical Software*. 67(8): 1-26.

# Package index

## Package summary

- [`divent`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/divent-package.md)
  [`divent-package`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/divent-package.md)
  : divent

## Datasets

- [`paracou_6_abd`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/paracou_6.md)
  [`paracou_6_wmppp`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/paracou_6.md)
  : Paracou plot 6
- [`paracou_6_fundist`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/paracou_6_fundist.md)
  : Functional distances between Paracou plot 6 species
- [`paracou_6_taxo`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/paracou_6_taxo.md)
  : Taxonomy of Paracou plot 6 species
- [`mock_3sp_abd`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/mock_3sp.md)
  [`mock_3sp_dist`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/mock_3sp.md)
  [`mock_3sp_tree`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/mock_3sp.md)
  : Mock data
- [`non_species_columns`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/non_species_columns.md)
  : Non-Species columns

## Generate data

- [`rcommunity()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/rcommunity.md)
  [`rspcommunity()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/rcommunity.md)
  : Random communities
- [`rlseries()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/rlseries.md)
  : Log-Series Distribution

## Diversity

- [`div_gen_simpson()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/div_gen_simpson.md)
  : Generalized Simpson's Diversity
- [`div_hill()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/div_hill.md)
  : Hill number of a Community
- [`div_hurlbert()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/div_hurlbert.md)
  : Hurlbert Diversity of a Community
- [`div_part()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/div_part.md)
  : Diversity partition
- [`div_pd()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/div_pd.md)
  : Faith's Phylogenetic Diversity of a Community
- [`div_phylo()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/div_phylo.md)
  : Phylogenetic Diversity of a Community
- [`div_richness()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/div_richness.md)
  : Number of Species of a Community
- [`div_similarity()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/div_similarity.md)
  : Similarity-Based Diversity of a Community

## Entropy

- [`ent_allen()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/ent_allen.md)
  : Allen et al.'s Phylogenetic Entropy of a Community
- [`ent_gen_simpson()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/ent_gen_simpson.md)
  : Generalized Simpson's Entropy
- [`ent_hurlbert()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/ent_hurlbert.md)
  : Hurlbert Entropy of a Community
- [`ent_phylo()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/ent_phylo.md)
  : Phylogenetic Entropy of a Community
- [`ent_rao()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/ent_rao.md)
  : Rao's Quadratic Entropy of a Community
- [`ent_shannon()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/ent_shannon.md)
  : Shannon's Entropy of a Community
- [`ent_similarity()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/ent_similarity.md)
  : Similarity-Based Entropy of a Community
- [`ent_simpson()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/ent_simpson.md)
  : Simpson's Entropy of a Community
- [`ent_sp_simpson()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/ent_sp_simpson.md)
  [`ent_sp_simpsonEnvelope()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/ent_sp_simpson.md)
  : Spatially Explicit Simpson's Entropy
- [`ent_tsallis()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/ent_tsallis.md)
  : Tsallis Entropy of a Community

## Diversity accumulations

- [`accum_ent_phylo()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/accum_div_phylo.md)
  [`accum_div_phylo()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/accum_div_phylo.md)
  : Phylogenetic Diversity Accumulation of a Community
- [`accum_tsallis()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/accum_hill.md)
  [`accum_hill()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/accum_hill.md)
  : Diversity Accumulation of a Community
- [`plot(`*`<accum_sp>`*`)`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/accum_sp.md)
  [`autoplot(`*`<accum_sp>`*`)`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/accum_sp.md)
  [`plot_map()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/accum_sp.md)
  : Spatial Accumulation of Diversity
- [`accum_sp_tsallis()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/accum_sp_hill.md)
  [`accum_sp_hill()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/accum_sp_hill.md)
  [`accum_mixing()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/accum_sp_hill.md)
  : Spatial Diversity Accumulation of a Community

## Diversity profiles

- [`profile_hill()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/profile_hill.md)
  : Diversity Profile of a Community
- [`profile_phylo()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/profile_phylo.md)
  : Phylogenetic Diversity Profile of a Community
- [`profile_similarity()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/profile_similarity.md)
  : Similarity-Based Diversity Profile of a Community

## Functional features

- [`fun_ordinariness()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/fun_ordinariness.md)
  : Functional ordinariness of a community
- [`fun_similarity()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/fun_similarity.md)
  : Functional similarity

## Plots

- [`plot(`*`<accum_sp>`*`)`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/accum_sp.md)
  [`autoplot(`*`<accum_sp>`*`)`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/accum_sp.md)
  [`plot_map()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/accum_sp.md)
  : Spatial Accumulation of Diversity
- [`autoplot(`*`<accumulation>`*`)`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/autoplot.accumulation.md)
  : Plot Accumulation Objects
- [`autoplot(`*`<profile>`*`)`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/autoplot.profile.md)
  : Plot Profile Objects
- [`autoplot(`*`<wmppp>`*`)`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/autoplot.wmppp.md)
  : ggplot method to plot wmppp objects
- [`plot(`*`<species_distribution>`*`)`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/plot.species_distribution.md)
  [`autoplot(`*`<species_distribution>`*`)`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/plot.species_distribution.md)
  : Plot Profile Objects
- [`plot(`*`<phylo_divent>`*`)`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/plot.phylo_divent.md)
  : Plot phylo_divent Objects

## Statistics from species distributions

- [`abd_freq_count()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/abd_freq_count.md)
  : Abundance Frequency Count of a Community
- [`abd_species()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/abd_species.md)
  [`abd_sum()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/abd_species.md)
  [`prob_species()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/abd_species.md)
  : Abundances of Communities
- [`coverage()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/coverage.md)
  [`coverage_to_size()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/coverage.md)
  : Sample Coverage of a Community
- [`fit_rac()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/fit_rac.md)
  : Fit a distribution

## Classes

- [`species_distribution()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/species_distribution.md)
  [`as_species_distribution()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/species_distribution.md)
  [`is_species_distribution()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/species_distribution.md)
  [`as_probabilities()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/species_distribution.md)
  [`is_probabilities()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/species_distribution.md)
  [`abundances()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/species_distribution.md)
  [`as_abundances()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/species_distribution.md)
  [`is_abundances()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/species_distribution.md)
  [`as.matrix(`*`<species_distribution>`*`)`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/species_distribution.md)
  [`as.double(`*`<species_distribution>`*`)`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/species_distribution.md)
  [`as.numeric(`*`<species_distribution>`*`)`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/species_distribution.md)
  : Species Distributions
- [`probabilities()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/probabilities.md)
  : Probabilities of Species
- [`as_phylo_divent()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/phylo_divent.md)
  [`is_phylo_divent()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/phylo_divent.md)
  : Class phylo_divent

## Utilities

- [`exp_q()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/exp_q.md) :
  Deformed exponential
- [`ln_q()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/ln_q.md) :
  Deformed logarithm
- [`e_n_q()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/e_n_q.md) :
  Grassberger's expectation of n^q
- [`metacommunity()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/metacommunity.md)
  : Aggregate communities into a metacommunity
- [`alphahull()`](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/reference/alphahull.md)
  : alpha-shape calculation

  :

  divent](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/articles/phylogenies.md):

  communities](https://ericmarcon.github.io/divent/articles/simulations.md):
